content: ***about this design*** this vela flower friend shawl 2 is completely made with 1 of the 3 unique flower stitches that were used for the original design called vela flower shawl 1 the vela flower shawl is dedicated to vela 4 who loves flowers and calls them her flower friends this shawl features vela s flower friend 2 make sure to check out my other vela shawls as well - vela flower shawl 2 original design featuring all 3 stitches - vela flower friend shawl 1 3 - vela flower friend shawl 3 4 --- ***about this pattern*** crochet your own vela flower friend shawl 2 using this crochet pattern in pdf format the finished dimensions are height 60 cm / 23 5 width 155 cm / 61 this pattern contains written instructions in english and uses us crochet terminology the printable pdf has a total of 5 pages including the cover page available as an instant download --- ***questions & returns*** there are no returns on digital files please contact me if you have questions about the pattern --- ***please note *** please note that this is an ad-free and special formatted pdf version of my free crochet pattern that can be found on my linked blog by purchasing this pattern you support me in making more free patterns you can find the free version here https //wilmade com/vela-flower-friend-shawl-2/ ***find me on social media*** patterns https //wilmade com instagram https //instagram com/wilmawestenberg facebook https //www facebook com/bywilmade/ pinterest https //pinterest com/wilmawestenberg youtube https //www youtube com/c/wilmawestenberg 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/vela-flower-shawl 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/vela-flower-shawl 3 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/vela-flower-friend-shawl 4 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/vela-flower-friend-shawl-3
